title: Drawing The Line: Episode 261
description:
This week, the UK True Crime podcast delves into the dark world of extreme pornography and how a man in Cornwall, with a strong interest in so called 'snuff' movies, played a role in the death of a woman almost 300 miles away.

1,Â  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
